New Records: Riyan Parag reeled off the last Sri Lankan wickets off the first two balls of the last over
Key Match Events: Sri Lanka collapsed in a heap after Pathum Nissanka was dismissed by Axar Patel in the 15th over
Riyan Parag cleans up Shanaka and Mendis in the 17th over
Bishnoi drops Nissanka but then gets him out in the 15th over
Arshdeep Singh gets the breakthrough and Kusal Mendis's impressive innings ends
Pre-Game Insights: Selectors show faith in Gill's T20I struggle
Post-Match Reflections: India's new era begins with a resounding win
India came back from the dead against South Africa in THAT match last month
Miscellaneous Highlights: India beat Sri Lanka by 43 runs
Sri Lanka went from being 140/1 at the start of the 15th over to 163/7 by the 18th
Riyan Parag to bowl the last over
